channel.title: Re-Balance
channel.description:
Welcome to my project thread. Many of you may be wondering what Re-Balance is well Re-Balance is an attempt the Bring and Economy To the three most used bases (In my opionon) and also balance the combat triangle.
Im going to be using a Delta Base, A Project Insanity Base, And a Project Czar base to start out with below i will list some key goals for each base
Delta
Deleting All Customs Creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache balancing the combat triangle
Czar
Removing all useless commands and spam text deleting all customs creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache start to balance to combat triangle
Update Log [code]2/19 Started to remove all usesless commands and text Removed all Shops, Npcs, And items from the .cfg files Started to add basic wieldable items with real runescape stats -------------------------------------------------------------------------[/code]
Project Instanity Deleting All Customs Creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache balancing the combat triangle
If you would like to help im currently working on the czar part of my development this is the template you should post Mainly im just going to need help balancing the combat triangle seeing as how this is the hardest part
[code]Name Age Past Experience Proof Msn (Feel free to pm me that) Anything else you think i should know[/code]

Why not just rip all 3 combats and look at the source code?

Also I don’t see how this is a project. All your doing is deleting someone elses work?[/quote]
im deleting it so i can re write it but i can see were your coming from.
